summary: File/folder browser UI with List/Gallery view toggle; ongoing UI/UX refinements and regressions being restored.

existing_features.title: Restore file/folder row action buttons in List view so they are visible at all times (not only on mouse hover), while keeping tooltips on those action buttons.

Restore the top action buttons in the File Browser header area to use labeled buttons (not icon-only) with no tooltips, and enforce the button order: Upload Files, then Upload Folder, then Create Folder.
Restore the clickable folder path/breadcrumb context when viewing search results so users can click the displayed path to navigate to the containing folder.
Set the application version to 0.4.111 and ensure it is reflected wherever the app version is displayed in the UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore action buttons to be visible at all times (not hover-only) while keeping their tooltips.
